about_the_game:
Get ready to dive into the high-speed, action-packed world of Skyline Savior!

Take control of Sam’s car and navigate through a series of exciting and challenging environments. With a unique set of abilities at your disposal, you’ll need to overcome difficult obstacles to become the ultimate hero of the skies.

Thrilling Gameplay Mechanics


  • Arcadey Car Movement: Enjoy smooth, responsive driving with the ability to jump, dash, and perform awesome stunts.


  • Magnet: Use the car’s magnet to interact with various magnets around the map, overcoming obstacles by attracting or repelling the car.


  • Slow Motion: Slow down time to navigate through tricky sequences and nail those precise maneuvers. You are falling down? Slow the time down so you can afford waiting for the dash cooldown to end.


  • Dash and Downforce: Get a burst of speed with the dash ability to cover distances quickly. Activate the Downforce skill to push the car down, like a reverse jump, allowing for precise landings and new strategic moves.


Game Modes


  • Regular Mode: Navigate through levels with strategically placed checkpoints, allowing you to respawn and continue from key points.
  • Pretty Hard Mode: Embrace the ultimate challenge with no checkpoints from start to finish, pushing your skills and endurance to the limit.
  • Impossible Mode: On top of not having checkpoints, you also don’t have dash and boost skills! Need more challenge? The magnet is now limited to a specific number of seconds. Good luck!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300x / Intel Core i3 7100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600x / Intel Core i5 7400
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Control Sam’s car in Skyline Savior with arcadey movement, jumping, dashing, slow motion, and downforce skills. Conquer obstacles in regular, pretty hard, and impossible modes for the ultimate challenge.
